example.text: ESG is less freedom for Americans. ESG simply is a woke capitalist scam posing as responsible corporate governance, which robs Americans of their hard-earned retirement investments.

This week, I was proud to introduce the National POW/MIA Memorial and Museum Act . This bipartisan legislation will designate the POW/MIA Memorial and Museum at Cecil Field in Jacksonville, FL as the national landmark to honor all former prisoners of war and those still missing in action.

For too long, we've handcuffed ourselves when it comes to our oil and natural gas potential, but HR 1 will uncuff American ingenuity and our oil producing capabilities and get America back on track. CLICK HERE TO WATCH!

Mr. Speaker, how would you explain to General George S Patton that an American President believes a drag show digital ambassador gives our military a strategic advantage? It sounds absurd, but what is even more absurd is it is true.

It is time to stand against the progressive mob and safeguard our Nation's energy independence from the outstretched claws of ESG. A correct vote on the bill today is ``yes,'' as a ``yes'' vote today says no to ESG.

Alarmingly, between 2013 and 2020, US colleges and universities accepted nearly a billion dollars in Chinese donations. We know that our higher education institutions are being purchased and manipulated by the Chinese Communist Party.
